config.time-graph-title: TPa: At least 75% of 'In Progress' issues must match creation of a branch.(by Team, Hourly)
TPb: At least 75% of 'In Progress' issues must have different branches associated.(by Team, Hourly)
TPc: At least 75% of 'In Review' issues must match creation of a Pull Request.(by Team, Hourly)
TPd: At least 75% of 'Done' issues must match merge of a Pull Request.(by Team, Hourly)
TPe: Number of “In Progress” issues is less than or equal to 1.(by Member, Hourly)
TPf: Number of “Done” issues is greater than or equal to 1.(by Member, Weekly)
TPg: At least 75% of merged Pull Requests are approved.(by Team, Hourly)
TPh.1: At least 75% of merged Pull Requests are approved.(by Member, Weekly)
TPh.2: At least 1 of the merged Pull Requests is approved.(by Member, Weekly)
TPi.1: At least 20% of PRs opened by others are approved or commented on.(by Member, Weekly)
TPi.2: At least 1 of those open PRs is approved or commented on.(by Member, Weekly)

custom.title: Get merged PRs with at least one positive review
Get merged PRs with at least one positive review
Get pull requests with at least one comment by member

guarantees.notes:
#### Description
```
TPa: At least 75% of 'In Progress' issues must match creation of a branch.(by Team, Hourly)
guarantees.description: TPa - When an issue is moved to In Progress, a branch associated with this issue must be created.

guarantees.notes:
#### Description
```
TPb: At least 75% of 'In Progress' issues must have different branches associated.(by Team, Hourly)
guarantees.description: TPb - Each issue In Progress must have a different branch associated with it.

guarantees.notes:
#### Description
```
TPc: At least 75% of 'In Review' issues must match creation of a Pull Request.(by Team, Hourly)
guarantees.description: TPc - When an issue is moved to In Review, a Pull Request associated with that issue must be created.

guarantees.notes:
#### Description
```
TPd: At least 75% of 'Done' issues must match merge of a Pull Request.(by Team, Hourly)
guarantees.description: TPd - When an issue is moved to Done, the Pull Request associated to the issue must be merged.

guarantees.notes:
#### Description
```
TPe: Number of “In Progress” issues is less than or equal to 1.(by Member, Hourly)
guarantees.description: TPe - Each developer should only be working on one issue at a time.

guarantees.notes:
#### Description
```
TPf: Number of “Done” issues is greater than or equal to 1.(by Member, Weekly)
guarantees.description: TPf - Each developer should be finishing at least one issue per week.

guarantees.notes:
#### Description
```
TPg: At least 75% of merged Pull Requests are approved.(by Team, Hourly)
guarantees.description: TPg - Each Pull Request should be approved before merging.

guarantees.notes:
#### Description
```
TPh.1: At least 75% of merged Pull Requests are approved.(by Member, Weekly)
guarantees.description: TPh.1 - Each developer should only merge a Pull Request if it is approved.

guarantees.notes:
#### Description
```
TPh.2: At least 1 of the merged Pull Requests is approved.(by Member, Weekly)
guarantees.description: TPh.2 - Each developer should only merge a Pull Request if it is approved

guarantees.notes:
#### Description
```
TPi.1: At least 20% of PRs opened by others are approved or commented on.(by Member, Weekly)
guarantees.description: TPi.1 - Each developer should add comments or approve several other teammates' open Pull Requests each week.

guarantees.notes:
#### Description
```
TPi.2: At least 1 of those open PRs is approved or commented on.(by Member, Weekly)
guarantees.description: TPi.2 - Each developer should add comments or approve several other teammates' open Pull Requests each week.
